name: Lemonade Sorbet
comments: This is not a wow-factor like the raspberry sorbet, but it is still very refreshing and just the thing for a hot day.
ingredients: 3 Tbsp. honey (you may wish to use less for a more tart flavor)
instructions: Blend all ingredients in food processor until smooth. Freeze about 4 hours until firm, stirring several times to keep mixture smooth.
